1.content: You are in your global class sitting across from a girl. She is a year younger than you. You are 17 and she is 16. You kind of know her but you just don't talk to her much. Her name is Keirsten. She is wearing a blue hoodie, jeans, and black flip flops, she has long brownish blonde hair and has about a B cup. Her toes are painted pink...
1.title: Intro.. PLEASE AD WHERE THE STORY STOPS!!

choices: Keirstens Sister Alanna Opens The Door
11.content:
While you are sitting in class listening to the teacher lecture you can't help but to notice Keirstens feet and start to glance at them. She sits there twirling her foot around in her flip flops then places them back down on the ground. You can't help but stare, her feet look so soft, her skin so smooth, you begin to stare, looking her feet up and down, you glance up and your eyes meet with hers. She is siting there infront of you with a confused grin on her face
"What are you staring at?" She says as she giggles. Your heart starts beating faster at the though of being caught in the act and you simply say
"Nothing, I was just zoning out." She looks back to the board and continues to take notes, you do the same. Towards the end of class she hands you a note and tells you not to read it until after class. You sit there and wait for the final bell to ring, once it does you go to your locker and put your books away and then open the note and it reads..

"I've read about guys like you, my sisters bestfriends brother has a fetish. I want you to meet me after school today, my parents know you are coming. Don't worry they won't be home long, they are going out tonight. Come by around 6:30pm See you then!"

You close the note...*LATER THAT DAY*
6:30p.m. finally rolls around and you pull up to her house and walk to the front door, you very slowly and shakily knock on it. You wait there for what feels like an eternity then somebody finally opens the door..
11.title: Chapter 1.

choices: Keirsten Gets You To Submit Herself..

111.content:

"Good. It was a long one, its so hot out today, I'm all sweaty and my feet are killing me"
"Just relax and take it easy for tonight. We are going out and won't be home till late" Her parens each give her a kis on the forehead and walk out the door. There you are, left alone with the girl who knows your deepest secret.

"No. Feet are gross as hell!"

1112.content:
Keirsten had asked her sister for help in making you admit that you love her feet. You didn't even know another girl was in the house at this time, just like they had planned. You glanced at Keirsten who's pink top revealed quite a bit of sexy cleavage. She grinned at you and suddenly a bag was over your head. The plastic bag was wrapped tight around your head and you immediately tried to breathe but the bag clung to your face.

Keirsten quickly straddled you and grabbed your hands. You were a guy so you were stronger, you freed your hands and tried to grab at the bag but she flung her body on one arm. It was pinned but you still had the other arm to try to rip the bag off however whoever was holding it in place has leverage, then it got worse as Keirsten used her legs to grab your other arm. You were sitting on the couch with Keirsten laying sideways on top of you, both arms holding one of your arms and her legs scissoring your other arm.

You gasped for air and felt the bag tighten around your face, it wasn't oxygen but your own recycled CO2. You yell, "Get off of me, I can't breathe!"

Keirsten laughs, "Don't worry - we aren't going to kill you, we just need to get you nice and tied up!"

You struggle to breath, your lungs are on fire. "Nooo please, I could die."

You hear the female voice from above you, the person who has the iron grip on the bag, "Don't be such a wimp, people pass out all the time..."

Your struggles grow frantic as the recycled air does nothing to appease the liquid fire scorching your chest. With a final terrified shudder your body grows still and limp.

11121.content:
You come to with a mild headache and look around. The first thing you notice is that you are tied up tight and are going nowhere. The next thing you notice is that you have something stuffed into your mouth.

You nodded your head... but was that because you truly agreed or because you just needed it out of your mouth so you could scream for help at the top of your lungs?
